summary: Despite the police's preemptive strike, the illegal coast-to-coast car race is still on with new drivers. It's a race where fair play, red lights, stop signs, police roadblocks and traffic rules in general have no validity.
cast: John Candy|Donna Dixon|Matt Frewer|Joe Flaherty|Tim Matheson|Mimi Kuzyk|Melody Anderson|Shari Belafonte|Brian George|Art Hindle|Dick Smothers|Tom Smothers|Peter Boyle|Don Lake|John Schneider|Jamie Farr|Lee Van Cleef|Harvey Atkin|Eugene Levy|Michael Spinks|Brooke Shields|Alyssa Milano|Louis Del Grande|Carl Lewis|Jean Pierre Bergeron|Sabrina Boudot|Randy Johnson|Jon Luvelli|Richard Petty|James Rae
title: Los locos del cannonball III
